Package fr.sorbonne_u.sylalexcenter.application

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.sylalexcenter.application.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI, ApplicationManagementI, ApplicationNotificationHandlerI, ApplicationServicesI, java.rmi.Remote
    public class Application
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements ApplicationManagementI, ApplicationServicesI, ApplicationNotificationHandlerI
    The class Application implements a an application component

    Description

    An application will send requests to the AdmissionController containing the application URI and the number of cores the application needs. The application deploys a RequestGenerator before each admission request, and if application is accepted, starts generating requests
    Author:
    Alexandra Tudor, Sylia Righi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Application

        public Application​(java.lang.String appURI,
                   java.lang.Integer coresNeeded,
                   java.lang.Double meanInterArrivalTime,
                   java.lang.Long meanNumberOfInstructions,
                   java.lang.Long applicationTime,
                   java.lang.String applicationManagementInboundPortURI,
                   java.lang.String applicationServicesInboundPortURI,
                   java.lang.String applicationSubmissionInboundPortURI,
                   java.lang.String applicationNotificationInboundPortURI)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        appURI - : application uri
        coresNeeded - : minimum number of cores application needs to be able to run
        meanInterArrivalTime - : the mean inter-arrival time of requests in ms, for Request Generator
        meanNumberOfInstructions - : mean number of instructions of the requests in ms, for Request Generator
        applicationServicesInboundPortURI - : services handle admission communication
        applicationSubmissionInboundPortURI - : submissions handle requests to admission controller
        applicationNotificationInboundPortURI - : notifications handle termination requests
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
